General.Name: Blue Ocean Acquisition Corp Unit
General.Description: Blue Ocean Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company intends to focus within the consumer Internet sector in segments, such as online marketplaces, education technology, advertising technology, digital media and enabling technologies, and direct-to-consumer e-commerce businesses. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Chevy Chase, Maryland.
General.Address: 2 Wisconsin Circle, Chevy Chase, MD, United States, 20815
